SEEALSO: cfcache, CachePut, CacheGet, CacheGetAllIds, CacheGetMetadata, CacheRemove, CacheSetProperties
DESCRIPTION: Lets you retrieve the underlying cache object to access additional cache functionality that is not implemented in the tag cfcache.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Any of the following values: object template name of the user-defined cache
Set to true if objectType is user-defined cache. The default value is false.
